scripts.start: npx gulp copyAssets && npx gulp watch & npx @11ty/eleventy --config=local-eleventy.js --serve
scripts.build: npx gulp copyAssets && npx gulp compile && npx @11ty/eleventy --config=local-eleventy.js
scripts.federalist: npx gulp copyAssets && npx gulp compile && npx @11ty/eleventy --config=federalist-eleventy.js
